DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study include intervention control arm . The control arm receive face-to-face pharmacy clinic visit per standard care . The intervention arm receive pharmacy clinic visit plus additional telephone follow-up . Patients hemoglobin A1c last 3 month great 9 % eligible . Eligible patient must primary care physician Johns Hopkins Outpatient Center ( JHOC ) East Baltimore Medical Center ( EBMC ) . Purpose : To compare change hemoglobin A1c 3 month study period intervention group patient participate telemedicine , control group
DOC.brief_title: Pharmacists Provide Telemedicine Addition Clinic Visits Improve Diabetes Management
DOC.criteria: Adult patient primary care provider JHOC EMBC Patients see primary care provider within last 6 month Patients hemoglobin A1c great 9 % Patients < 18 year age Patients previously establish care JHH ambulatory care pharmacist Patients communication barrier caregiver Patients new diagnosis diabetes Patients pregnant plan become pregnant time study Patients follow Endocrinology Diabetes Center
